meta_description: The St. Joseph Museums includes the Glore Psychiatric Museum, Black Archives Museums, Native American and History Galleries, Doll Museum, and the Wyeth-Tootle Mansion.
hours_text:
# St. Joseph Museum Complex

Hours & Admission

Hours​

Open DAILY 10am - 5pm

​

Closed on the following holidays:

New Year’s Eve, New Year’s Day, Memorial Day, Easter Sunday, Juneteenth, Independence Day, Labor Day, Thanksgiving, Christmas Eve, Christmas Day.

In times of inclement weather please call in advance.

​.

Admission:  
One admission price welcomes you to all four museums in one site, located on Frederick Avenue. We accept cash, check or major credit cards. 

  * Children 3 and under: FREE

  * Children 4-6: $4.00

  * Students: $8.00

  * Adults: $12.00

  * Seniors (62+): $10.00

  * Group Rate (10 or More): $8.00

Museum members always receive free admission at all of our sites.​​

​

Location:​

3406 Frederick Ave.

St. Joseph, MO 64506

The St. Joseph Museum complex on Frederick Avenue includes the following:

Glore Psychiatric Museum

Black Archives Museum

Doll Museum

Archaeology and Native American Galleries

​

Tours generally take 1.5 hours. 

​

## Wyeth-Tootle Mansion

### Hours & Admission

## Check out our on-line Teacher Resources and Field Trip Packets! 

[Click here! ](https://www.stjosephmuseum.org/educational-resources)

​​The Mansion is open seasonally from April - October

Please note that since the Mansion is available to rent for private events – it may be closed to the public for a short time. 

Hours​

Friday and Saturday 10am - 4pm

Other hours for groups (10+ people) available by appointment

​
